item.title: Masterthesis
item.description: My masterthesis was on the topic “spaces of positive curvature metrics on nonorientable manifolds”. You can find a pdf version here and the entire LaTeX-Code in the Git-Repository.

item.title: About Me
item.description: currently I am a PhD Student of Kai Cieliebak at University of Augsburg, Germany. I am generally interested in algebraic and differential topology, lately my new focus lies on String Topology as well as Piecewise Linear Symplectic Geometry. See my past research projects for an overview of what i have done before.
